channel.title: How to make server.dueling = false every time i restart
channel.description:
Its allways true and I want to have dueling off for while untill someone comes up with a fix for the report button duping.
Please
Thank You

item.title: How to make server.dueling = false every time i restart
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

K i just did

public void duelReq(int pid) {
	if (server.dueling == true) {
		sendMessage("DUELING IS DISABLED DUE TO DUPING UNTILL FIX");
		return;

And it worked, is that good enough?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make server.dueling = false every time i restart

item.title: How to make server.dueling = false every time i restart
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

You can always prevent people from dueling. Theres only one thing that makes people duel, which is right click, and click duel, Just change the name, as well as change the case that controls it.

Comment everything out except the case number && the break;

Read full topic
item.source: How to make server.dueling = false every time i restart

item.title: How to make server.dueling = false every time i restart
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

Java Is My Bitch:

So delete dueling from your server…?

I dont want to delete dueling, cause I will need it later on.

How do you set a void to turn it false when ever you restart.

Read full topic
